c74object.name: zero.announce
c74object.digest: Publish an available service using ZeroConf
c74object.description: Publish an available service using ZeroConf

attribute.name: domain
attribute.description: Domain for the service. The name 'local' is reserved for ZeroConf usage.

attribute.name: port
attribute.digest: Network port on which the service is provided
attribute.description: Network port on which the service is provided.

attribute.name: name
attribute.digest: Name of the service to publish
attribute.description: Name of the service to publish.
